topic.title: I can't share newly created sites
topic.body:
When i create a new blank site, from "zerohello" -> "create new, empty site"
I then sign the site, when I try to access the newly created site from another computer, it says "no peers found"

I can not publish any new sites I create. Is there somthing i am missing?

1604066219_mirrored_viktorstrate_github.body:
@HelloZeroNet, I have the port open and pointing on one of the computers, but both of the computers are on the same network.

Edit I shared it publicly, like @MuxZeroNet suggested, and now it works ;)
Ah okay, thank you for the help :)
